Title: Relates to emergency medical services
Summary: Relates to emergency medical services; establishes a special district for the financing and operation of general ambulance services; provides for a statewide comprehensive emergency medical system plan.
LawCode: Amd §122-b, Gen Muni L; amd §§3000, 3001 & 3020, add §§3019 & 3019-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public health law, in relation to emergency medical services
